hymn.title: Though we are often swayed and tossed

layout.singingstanza: Though we are of -- ten swayed and tossed, Change -- less for -- ev -- er He en -- dures; None of His prom -- is -- es are lost; None is so sure in heav'n or earth.

lyrics.stanza: He'll never once our trust betray; All we entrust Him, He upholds. As first He loved, He loves always, Loving us to the uttermost.
Such love! To us who, conscience seared, Wounded, forgot Him faithlessly, To us who many gods revered, Hearts void of all apology.
When all our idols ceased to be, Sadly we sought Him once again Whom we'd let down continually, Our first-to-last unchanging Friend.
Yet He accepts us and consoles And to Himself He draws us nigh As though no fault e'er marred our souls, He loves us to the end of time.
